Mother Red Cap, Upper Holloway • whatpub.com WhatPub will be shut down from 1st October 2025. You don’t have to do anything,
                but after this date whatpub.com will automatically redirect you to the CAMRA website. Try the new CAMRA website WhatPub will be shut down from 1st October 2025 We’ve brought all our data and pub-going tools together, so you can get the best of everything CAMRA has to offer in one convenient place. You don’t have to do anything, but after this date whatpub.com will automatically redirect you to the CAMRA website. Try the CAMRA website Prefer to stay on this page? No problem! Click here to remain on the current site. Join CAMRA | Member Login Home About Search FAQs Cookies Service Announcement Search > Mother Red Cap New Search About Location Submit Updates Nearby Recently Viewed (1) NOTICE :Opening hours and services may be different from those displayed here. Before visiting, we advise that you check ahead by phone or via social media to avoid disappointment. If you see any details here that need updating, please let us know by submitting updates on the pub . Mother Red Cap (formerly Red Cap) 665 Holloway Road Upper Holloway N19 5SE View on Map Real Ale is NOT Available (020) 7263 7082 Premises Status This
                                                pub
                        
                        is

                                                    long-term closed. Opening Times Regular Monday 9.00 am - Midnight Tuesday 9.00 am - Midnight Wednesday 9.00 am - Midnight Thursday 9.00 am - 1.00 am Friday 9.00 am - 2.00 am Saturday 9.00 am - 2.00 am Sunday 9.00 am - Midnight Operator Phelan Inns About
                         the Pub Noted as closed after St Patrick’s Day on 18th March 2024 (on Facebook). Landlord retired. Future uncertain. A traditional irish pub with some nice tiling in the vestibule. Historic Interest Local Listing:- Dual granite frontage. Holloway Road: Two stallrisers, five pilasters, two clear glass windows, one timber panelled/smoked glass double door, clear glass fanlight and extract. Regular ales No beers listed Add regular beers Add changing beers Updated on 27/03/2024 Last surveyed on 27/03/2024 Branch responsible is North London Seen some incorrect or missing details? Send an email to the CAMRA branch with your updates. Email this pub to a friend Facilities Traditional Pub Games Pool & darts. Live Music Sports TV TNT.                                                         Station (1750m) Kentish Town Nearby London Underground/Overground/DLR (150m) Archway Submit Pub Updates to CAMRA We welcome the help of all users to contribute to this important campaigning project. Please use the form below to submit feedback or updates directly to the  CAMRA branch for consideration. Please note that any changes mentioned WILL NOT have an immediate effect on whatpub.com but will instead be emailed directly to the  CAMRA branch Pubs Officer for consideration. If you provide your name and/or email address this information will also be visible to the Pubs Officer, who may use this information to follow up your feedback. IF YOU WISH TO CONTACT THE PUB DIRECT, PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS FORM. Logged in CAMRA members do not need to enter their name, email or pass the captcha. Go to Login page Your Name:* Your Email Address:* Message:* Send to CAMRA Results are based on your filters selected. Beer scoring is only available to CAMRA members. To start scoring please login below or join CAMRA on the national website. Join CAMRA | Member Login Campaign for your local We campaign on a number of issues to help keep pubs open and pints affordable. If you love beer and pubs, get involved today! Hooleys Public House - Rancho San Diego - San Diego, CA × Order your favorite Hooleys dishes for Delivery! Or call in and pick them up for Takeout! Visit our Order Now page, and get Hooleys delivered straight to your door! Or call the Pub and order from one of our Hooligans directly! Order Online Parties & Groups - Host your next Party or Holiday Gathering at Hooleys! Contact us now! Book your party here! Parties & Groups - Host your next Party or Holiday Gathering at Hooleys! Contact us now! Job Listings - Want to work with us Hooligans! Apply online now! Click the Link to be directed to our Hiring Page! Hooleys Hiring Page! Job Listings - Want to work with us Hooligans! Apply online now! Click the Link to be directed to our Hiring Page! Skip to Main Content katherine@hooleys.com 2955 Jamacha Road - El Cajon                                                          , San Diego MENU DRINKS Drinks - Rancho Drinks - La Mesa SPECIALS EVENTS Events - Rancho Events - La Mesa ORDER PICKUP OR DELIVERY PARTIES Parties - Rancho Parties - La Mesa Parties - Banquet Menu JOBS Twitter page Facebook page Instagram page Yelp page Toggle navigation Twitter page Facebook page Instagram page Yelp page MENU DRINKS SPECIALS EVENTS ORDER PICKUP OR DELIVERY PARTIES JOBS Drinks - Rancho Drinks - La Mesa Events - Rancho Events - La Mesa Parties - Rancho Parties - La Mesa Parties - Banquet Menu map marker pin 5500 Grossmont Center Dr - La Mesa, CA 91942 map marker pin 2955 Jamacha Road - El Cajon, CA 92019 About us About us Hooley [.poss Hidust. Hoolie - a hindu festival, brought back by Irish soldiers]. In the mid-1980s while touring Europe, Craig MacDonald, owner and founder of Hooleys, made his first visit to Ireland. So taken was he by the Pub Culture of the Emerald Isle he decided there and then that he would one day import the warmth and charm of an old Irish Pub to his hometown in San Diego, California. With the help of two great friends (now partners), Craig realized his dream, and on Saint Patrick's Day of 1999, the doors to Hooleys Irish Pub & Grill first opened in Rancho San Diego. Our menu Restaurant menu Specials Do you love Wing, Wine & Whiskey Wednesday as much as we do?! Enjoy 4 for $3 Wings, 1/2 OFF Wine Bottles and 1/2 OFF all of our Whiskeys! BOTH PUBS OPEN @ 11AM! Wednesday Specials are for Dine-In only. 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM ALL SPECIALS Events Check out our upcoming events Events rancho Events La Mesa Order Pickup or Delivery Order Pickup or Delivery Birthday Club Find out more and join our club here join our club ! Reviews review by - Yelp Chris C: ...Last weekend, the wifey and I had dinner and drinks at the Rancho San Diego location.  Service was excellent...drinks were excellent...food was excellent!  I wasn't too hungry so I ordered something that I would not normally order.  I had the turkey melt with fries. Like I said, I normally would not have ordered that, but after devouring the turkey melt, I will say...I will probably order it again in the future... review by - Yelp Lily A: I always have a great time at Hooleys, I would definitely recommend going for Taco Tuesday and taking advantage of their tacos and for a good price. The mood is soft and lively and the servers are excellent. I would recommend all tacos, but one in particular is the corned beef, was just amazing... review by - Yelp Siavash H: Just love this Cousy , clean bar and restaurant. You feel relaxed and well taken care of by the staff. I love their Alpine beer and fish tacos. My daughter when she visited totally loved the Irish stew. Very very busy on Friday nights. review by - Yelp Antonio Q: Hi I'm Autumn, the 7 month old daughter of Antonio.  I love this place, so does my mom and dad!  I went for the first time on Monday.  My mom got the half prime rib sandwich and soup.  And she was angry she didn't get the whole sandwich and bowl of soup instead because it was so good... review by - Yelp Mary B: This place is amazing! We always come here, often when they are busy. They always provide excellent service. The food comes out quick.. And always fresh. This is easily one of our favorite date spots. The bar area has cute little cut out booths with dimmed lighting. We love it. review by - Yelp Anne E: We've been coming to Hooley's for years and we are never disappointed. The staff is friendly, service is fast, but not rushed and the food is always delicious. I usually get the corned beef tacos, but I branched out tonight and tried a few new dishes. Every last one was amazing! Still crazy about Hooley's after all these years. :-) Newsletter Location Rancho San Diego: 2955 Jamacha Road El Cajon, CA 92019 Information: 619-670-PINT (7468) La Mesa/Grossmont Center: 5500 Grossmont Center Dr. La Mesa, CA 91942 Information: 619-713-6900 Hours Rancho San Diego: Tuesday-Thursday 11:00AM-10:00PM Friday 11:00AM-11:00PM Saturday 10:00AM-11:00PM Sunday 10:00AM-8:00PM La Mesa/Grossmont Center: Monday 4:00PM-9:00PM Tuesday-Thursday 11:00AM-10:00PM Friday 11:00AM-11:00PM Saturday 10:00AM-11:00PM Sunday 10:00AM-8:00PM Find us on... Twitter page Facebook page Instagram page Yelp page Contact us Rancho San Diego: Katherine Buckles katherine@hooleys.com La Mesa/Grossmont Center: Erin Turner erin@hooleys.com Powered by: Website design, Social Media marketing and Email marketing provided by SpotHopper. Order Call Rancho Call La Mesa Jobs × Newsletter We strive to make our website accessible to everybody. Learn More.

Contact us Opening Hours Our opening hours are as follows: Out of term time Monday to Friday | 7am - 9pm Saturdays | 9am - 4pm Sundays | 10am - 4pm Term time Monday to Friday | 7am - 10pm Saturdays | 9am - 6pm Sundays | 9.30am -10pm Click here to see the University's term dates . How to find us The Sports Centre is located off Prune Hill at the bottom of the University's Egham campus behind Gowar and Runnymede Halls. It is accessible by foot, bicycle and vehicle. Click here to see campus maps . Address Royal Holloway Sports Centre Prune Hill Egham Surrey TW20 0EX Travelling by car Royal Holloway is located just two miles from junction 13 of the M25. Exit at junction 13 and join the A30 towards Egham. Continue straight across the first roundabout and follow signs for the University. Pass the University’s entrance on your left and continue. At the crossroads, turn left onto Bakeham Lane and then take the first left onto Prune Hill. Continue down Prune Hill until you reach the entrance to the Sports Centre car park on your left. For sat navs Use postcode TW20 9TR when setting your destination. Car parking There are 61 parking spaces at the front of the Sports Centre with 5 of these reserved for blue badge users. There is also a further gravel car park at the far end of the centre, with the capacity for another 40 cars. Visitors to the Sports Centre not in possession of a parking permit may park in the Sports Centre car park for up to three hours for free, after which they should register their car at the Sports Centre reception. Travelling by train The nearest train station is Egham, which is located less than one mile away, with regular trains to and from London Waterloo station. From here, you can get a bus or taxi to the University campus. If travelling by foot or bicycle, there is step-free access to the back gate of the University campus (from Spring Rise), where our Sports Centre is located. Travelling by bus A number of bus routes pass through Egham High Street and Egham Hill, which then require a short walk onto campus. There is also a bus stop in front of the entrance to the University, along the A30. Contact Us For any enquiries and feedback connected with the Sports Centre and Royal Holloway Sport, the Active Lifestyle & Sport team would be more than happy to help. Give us a call on +44 (0)1784 443892. Email us sportscentre@royalholloway.ac.uk Pop into the Sports Centre and speak to one of the team at reception. You can also reach us on our Royal Holloway Sport social media channels.
